thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com | 4 of 10
thread.title: Gary

author: Gary
title: Gary
text:
Having travelled with many tour companies I would say that Intrepid provides the best value for money, travel styles and as close as possible to local interaction I have experienced. They also go to where I wanted to visit, with a size of group that suits me and using local transport rather than stuck in a tour bus.
Highly recommended intrepid and their sister companies.
